database

Class DatabaseAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseAccess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseCon, java.rmi.Remote

    public class DatabaseAccess
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseCon
    Java class responsible to connecting to the database component of the system and executing the commands. It makes use of a JDBC connection via a PreparedStatement to execute the procedures

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseAccess()
      Empty constructor for the DatabaseAccess object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String acceptInvite(Invitation invitation)
      Method used to change the status of an invitation to "accepted" Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
      java.lang.String addItem(Item item, Party party)
      Method used to add an item to a Party; The method verifies first if another instance of the same item, matching in name and price does exists in the system; If yes, the item is then added to the party, if not it is created in tha system and then added; Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
      java.lang.String addItems(java.util.List<Item> items, Party party)
      Method used to add a List to the Party given as parameter in the database; It calls successively the method addItem for all objects in the list If one add fails the method returns "fail" and aborts the procedure and "success" in the opposite case;
      java.lang.String addParticipant(Person person, Party party)
      Method used to add a Person (user) as participant in a Party in the database with mathing characteristics to the Party parameter Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
      java.lang.String addPeople(java.util.List<Person> people, Party party)
      Method used to add a List to the Party given as parameter in the database; It calls successively the method addParticipant for all objects in the list If one add fails the method returns "fail" and aborts the procedure and "success" in the opposite case;
      void close()
      Method for closing the connection.
      java.sql.Connection connect()
      Method that enables the connection to the database;
      Item createItem(Item item)
      Method used to create an Item or retrieve it from the database if it already exists; Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; The result is either a Item, mapped from the ResultSet of the PreparedStatement or null if the procedure resulted in an Exception due to failure
      Party createParty(Party party)
      Method used to create a new instance of a Party in the database system.
      Person createPerson(Person person)
      Method used to create a new instance of a person in the Database; Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; After insertion the method retrieves in similar steps the Person object obtained after the database insertion (with only persistence data generated)
      java.lang.String declineInvite(Invitation invitation)
      Method used to change the status of an invitation to "declined" Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
      java.util.List<Invitation> getInvitations(int personID)
      Method used to retrieve the invitations meant for a specific user specified through the personID parameter Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; The result is either a List, mapped from the ResultSet of the PreparedStatement or null if the procedure resulted in an Exception due to failure
      java.util.List<Item> getItems(int partyId)
      Method used to retrieve the List variable of a party given its unique id as parameter; Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; The result is either a List, mapped from the ResultSet of the PreparedStatement or null if the procedure resulted in an Exception due to failure
      java.util.List<Item> getItems(Party party)
      Method used to retrieve the items for a Party from the system Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; The result is either a List, mapped from the ResultSet of the PreparedStatement or null if the procedure resulted in an Exception due to failure
      java.util.List<Person> getParticipants(int partyID)
      Method used to retrieve a List that are participating the party specified through it's unique id as parameter; Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; The result is either a List, mapped from the ResultSet of the PreparedStatement or null if the procedure resulted in an Exception due to failure
      java.util.List<Party> getPartiesBySomething(java.lang.String something)
      Method used to retrieve a List matching the criteria defined by the parameter; Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; The result is either a List, mapped from the ResultSet of the PreparedStatement or null if the procedure resulted in an Exception due to failure
      java.util.List<Party> getPartiesForPerson(Person person)
      Method used to retrieve the list of parties in which th user described by the parameter participates in Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; The result is either a List or null if the procedure resulted in an Exception due to failure
      Party getParty(int partyID)
      Method used to retrieve a Party by it's unique id from the database.
      java.util.List<Person> getPeopleByName(java.lang.String smth)
      Method used to retrieve a List (users) matching the criteria defined by the parameter.
      Person getPersonByID(int personID)
      Method used to retrieve the user (Person object) matching with the id given as parameter Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; The result is either a Person, mapped from the ResultSet of the PreparedStatement or null if the procedure resulted in an Exception due to failure
      Person login(Person person)
      Method used to retrieve a user(Person object) if the credentials (name and username) for the Person object given as parameter match an instance of a person from the database Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; The result is either a Person, mapped from the ResultSet of the PreparedStatement or null if the procedure resulted in an Exception due to failure
      java.lang.String makeInvitations(java.util.List<Person> people, Party party)
      Method used to create an invitation to each instance of a Person (user) in the List given as parameter for the party object given as parameter from the system; It calls successively the method makeInvitation for all objects in the list If one add fails the method returns "fail" and aborts the procedure and "success" in the opposite
      java.lang.String removeItem(Party party, Item item)
      Method used to remove an Item from a Party in the system identified through the parameter Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
      java.lang.String removeItems(java.util.List<Item> items, Party party)
      Method used to remove a List to the Party given as parameter in the database; It calls successively the method removeItem for all objects in the list If one add fails the method returns "fail" and aborts the procedure and "success" in the opposite case;
      java.lang.String removeParticipant(Party party, Person person)
      Method used to remove a user (Person) as a participant from the party parameter in the system; Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
      java.lang.String removePeople(java.util.List<Person> people, Party party)
      Method used to remove a List to the Party given as parameter in the database; It calls successively the method removeParticipant for all objects in the list If one add fails the method returns "fail" and aborts the procedure and "success" in the opposite case;
      java.lang.String setPartyPrivacy(boolean privacy, Party party)
      Method used to change the privacy variable of the Party given as parameter in the system; Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
      Party updateParty(Party party)
      Method used to modify the static characteristics of the Party given as parameter in the system; Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; The result is either the updated Party, mapped from the ResultSet of the PreparedStatement or null if the procedure resulted in an Exception due to failure
      void updatePerson(Person person)
